basics.name: PHAN Dinh Triem
basics.label: Machine learning PhD candidate
basics.summary: A person interested in machine learning, data science and applied mathematics.

work.name: LNHB, LIST, CEA, Saclay, France
work.summary: Working on the application of machine learning to gamma-ray spectrometry. Developing a hybrid approach combining machine learning and physical properties.

publications.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
publications.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.
